医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
柑橘疗法挤出癌症患者的口干橙，柠檬和酸橙的天然柑橘油在缓解口干方面非常有效，并且在与新的脂质配方结合使用时，新的研究表明，它可能没有显着副作用而有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/citrus-remedy-squeezes-und-dry-dry-mouth-for-cancer-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/citrus-remedy-squeezes-un-dry-dry-mouth-for-cancer-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38638D41-2DAF-4633-B606-B5533460DC19 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 05:16:00 -0400 Citrus remedy squeezes out dry mouth for cancer patients
“社会处方”可以帮助年轻人通过心理健康挑战 - 新研究曼彻斯特大学研究人员发现，使用“社会处方”可以改善儿童和年轻人的健康，可以加强政府对心理健康支持的政策。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/e28098social-prescription28099-can-help-young-young-young-through-through-through-through-through-through-health-health-challenges-challenges-e28093-new-new-research..aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/e28098social-prescription28099-can-help-young-young-young-through-through-through-through-through-through-challenge-challenges-challenges-e28093-new-new-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc21b4fc-a228-4143-9459-15a23484d22e Mon, 24 Mar 2025 05:13:00 -0400 ‘Social prescriptions’ can help young people through mental health challenges – new research
疾病预防控制中心确认黑腿壁虱会导致人类的红肉过敏研究人员证实，黑腿s虫（ixodes capularis）可以触发人类的α-伽尔综合症。在缅因州进行的为期10年的监视确定了23例在孤星壁虱已知范围之外的肉过敏的案件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250323/cdc-confirms-black-legged-ticks-can-can-can-caus-red-meat-meat-meat-meat-allergy-in-humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250323/cdc-confirms-black--legge--------------------can-can-cause-red-meat-meat-meat-allergy-in-humans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01AB0E6-2B25-45ED-993D-028E94D122EB Sun, 23 Mar 2025 22:50:00 -0400 CDC confirms black-legged ticks can cause red meat allergy in humans
研究人员将73％的美国沙门氏菌盒追溯到鸡肉和蔬菜研究人员使用基因组测序和机器学习来追踪美国沙门氏菌感染后面的顶级食物。鸡肉和蔬菜作为主要罪魁祸首出现，占具有已知来源的人类病例的73％。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250323/researchers-trace-7325-of-------us-salmenella-cases-cases-to-chicken-and-vegetables.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250323/researchers-trace-7325-of------------------------ us-salmenella-cases-to-chicken-and-wegetables.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1B76535C-90E0-454E-454E-A70C-375110F9DFB5 Sun, 23 Mar 2025 22:22:00 -0400 Researchers trace 73% of US Salmonella cases to chicken and vegetables
您的饮食和益生菌如何提高疫苗有效性研究人员发现益生菌和饮食如何塑造肠道微生物组以提高疫苗功效，从而为精确免疫提供新的途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250323/how-your-your-diet-and-probiotics-can-improve-vaccine-effectives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250323/how-your-your-diet-and-probiotics-can-improve-vaccine-vaccine-effectives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d9ba18c-c104-4665-b3f4-f4-fd8c309864f6 Sun, 23 Mar 2025 21:34:00 -0400 How your diet and probiotics can improve vaccine effectiveness
7天的肌酸“洗涤”可以增强女性的肌肉质量 - 但长期不是长期的，研究表明7天的肌酸一水合物洗涤增加了女性的瘦体重，尤其是在树干中，但是在抵抗训练中添加肌酸并没有增加肌肉的增长，而不是单独训练。长期影响可能需要更高的剂量或水合跟踪。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250323/7-day-creatine-e28098wash-ine28099-boosts-muscle-mass-mass-in-in-women-e28094-but-not-not-long-term-term-stud-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250323/7-day-creatine-e28098wash-ine28099-boosts-muscle-muscle-mass-mass-in-women-e28094-but-not-not-not-long-long-stud-study-reveveals.comments.commentss.comments.comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62845753-1308-4937-ba20-ba20-b2a23d2c7d7a Sun, 23 Mar 2025 20:58:00 -0400 7-day creatine ‘wash-in’ boosts muscle mass in women — but not long-term, study reveals
主要研究表明长期遵守美国心脏协会的“生命基本8”生活方式得分大大降低了整体和特定地点癌症的风险。在四年内，稳定的高LE8分数与一项大型中国人群研究中的肺，乳房，肝脏和结直肠癌的风险较低有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250323/sticking-to-lifee28099s-sential-8-slashes-cancer-cancer-cancer------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250323/sticking-to-to-lifee28099s-sential-8-slashes-cancer-cancer-cancer-------------------------------------------- canccant-cancer-major-study-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=622252df-cfe5-4AA8-9074-1625A0828AE2 Sun, 23 Mar 2025 19:22:00 -0400 Sticking to Life’s Essential 8 slashes cancer risk, major study shows
尿失禁的妇女可以避免侵入性膀胱压力测试持续尿失禁的妇女可以避免侵入性膀胱压力测试，因为新的研究表明，一系列非侵入性评估在指导治疗方面同样有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/uncomfortable-bladder-tests-for-for-for-for-formale-incontinence-can-be-be-be-aver-say-say-say-say-say-say-say-say-say-aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/uncomfortable-bladder-tests-for-for-for-for-female-incontinence-can-be-be-be-be-avo-say-say-say-say-say-say-say-say-say-say-saspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=895fd1D1D1-BB09-4C1E-874C-BB41AB93B20D Sat, 22 Mar 2025 23:59:00 -0400 Women with urinary incontinence can avoid invasive bladder pressure tests
含水表现出有望治疗副作用较少的扩大前列腺研究的研究发现，使用高压水喷射在扩大的前列腺上进行操作可以更好地保留与标准激光手术相比射精的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/aquablation-shows-promise-promise-formise-foreating-promise-promise-promise-promise-prostate-prostate-with-fewer-fewer-fewer-fewer-fewects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/aquablation-shows-shows-promise-promise-formise-foreating-promise-promise-promise-prostate-prostate-prostate-with-fewer-fewer-fewer-fewects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19CA1289-77A0-4C2D-A184-2F938FBCAC10 Sat, 22 Mar 2025 23:58:00 -0400 Aquablation shows promise for treating enlarged prostate with fewer side effects
儿童肥胖会增加生活中COPD的风险将在今年的欧洲肥胖大会（ECO 2025，马拉加，西班牙马拉加，5月11日至14日）进行的新研究表明，儿童期在童年期间拥有超重或肥胖的轨迹与成年期间慢性阻塞性肺疾病（COPD）的风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/childhood-obesity-obesity-boosts-risks-copd-copd-later-in-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/childhood-obesity-obesity-boosts-copd-copd-copd-later-in-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d85461b4-3feb-480E-8680-0680-0ED28484CE5A Sat, 22 Mar 2025 23:56:00 -0400 Childhood obesity boosts risk of COPD later in life
